item.title: Shop Q & A
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row margin_top="0" margin_bottom="-50" padding_left="0" padding_right="0" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1"][vc_column width="1/1" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12"][dt_fancy_title title="We are usually asked about" title_align="left" title_size="h6" title_color="default" el_width="100" title_bg="disabled" separator_color="default"][vc_empty_space height="26px"][vc_accordion style="3" active_tab="false" collapsible="yes"][vc_accordion_tab title="How to add Google map?"][vc_column_text]Google Map shortcode simplifies the process of Google map HTML code embedding. Click on the Map widget in Visual Composer Visit Google maps to create your map.
  1. Find location;
  2. Click “Share” and make sure map is public on the web;
  3. Click folder icon to reveal “Embed on my site” link;
  4. Copy iframe code and paste it in Map embed iframe field in the widget.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to remove blinking fullscreen background in wide layout?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Appearance -> Layout -> Background under the box -> Remove an image -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to add iconfont icons to the main menu?"][vc_column_text]Icons can be assigned via Appearance -> Menus -> Click on a single menu item -> “Icon” property.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to make the site narrower or wider?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Appearance -> Layout -> Content width -> Enter the desired site width in pixels or percentages -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to disable breadcrumbs?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> Page titles -> Breadcrumbs -> Disable -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How many slideshows am I able to create?"][vc_column_text]You are able to create as many slideshows as you want and use them on any page or post.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="What cache plugin do you suggest to use?"][vc_column_text]We would like to advise you to install W3 Total Cache plugin.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Can I use Widgets in Visual Composer?"][vc_column_text]Yes, you can ad widget areas with the help of Widgetised Sidebar shortcode.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to change the number of columns in footer?"][vc_column_text]Please follow Theme Options -> General -> Footer & Bottom Bar -> Footer -> Footer Layout -> Layout -> Enter the desired footer structure, f.e. 1/2+1/4+1/4 -> Save[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How can I activate Slider Revolution?"][vc_column_text]The notice about Slider Revolution registration is a suggestion, not a requirement. The plugin is registered on Dream-Theme, and buyers of this theme do not need to register it once again. So, for now, could you please simply disregard the notice.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="How to remove a gap between slideshow and content?"][vc_column_text]There are 50px gaps between header and content area, content area and footer. You can add negative top and bottom margins (-50) in Visual Composer row setting to remove these gaps.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][vc_empty_space height="50px"][dt_fancy_title title="Didn’t find the answer?" title_align="left" title_size="h6" title_color="default" el_width="100" title_bg="disabled" separator_color="default"][vc_empty_space height="26px"][vc_column_text]Morbi ut mauris non ligula euismod dignissim ac ut orci. Nulla sodales tempus turpis, non interdum orci gravida eget.
